summary: This mod adds breathing motion to the male and female standard idles. And it adds BBB (Better Bouncing Breasts) to the female female characters. If you want.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"CDCCAA\"]\"WHERE THE BREASTS MAY BE FAKE, BUT MAN DO THEY SHAKE ...\".[/color] (Al Bundy, Nov 14, 1993)

___________________________________________________________________________________

[color=LightBlue][size=4]NoMaaM is Back  --  See the VIDEO ![/size][/color]

[size=4]This mod adds [color=\"CDCCAA\"]breathing motion[/color] to the male and female standard idles (mt_idle.hkx). And it adds [color=\"CDCCAA\"]BBB (Better Bouncing Breasts)[/color] to the female characters. If you want.[/size]

[size=1]BBB is the same as in the animation part of CherryHotaling\'s [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics[/url]. (Her skeleton also adds a little ragdoll effect). But since we are used to BBB from Oblivion, I prefer to stick with this name.[/size]

Like for Oblivion I intend to add these changes to all of Skyrim\'s idles (and there are many of them). But at the moment I will start slowly. Making animations here is very different, and much more complex. And I don\'t want to redo hundreds of animations once we understand the full complexity.

[size=3]That\'s why I consider this mod a BETA.[/size]

When using this mod, please keep in mind that the BBB animation works VERY different on \"heavy\" or \"light\" characters. What might look subtile on lights, is very bouncy on heavy sculptures. Maybe it will be possible with Havok to do dynamic adaptations. But right now, I don\'t know.

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]Required & Recommended Mods/Tools[/color][/size]

Only if you want BBB:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics[/url] (install first!)
[*]CHSBHC compatible clothing/armor meshes as they are available, e.g. [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=71]Twiggys Colourful Barkeeps and CHSBHC bouncing meshes [/url]
[/list]

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]INSTALLATION[/color][/size]

Copy the contents of ONE of the provided folders into your Skyrim/Data directory. Both contain the same male version of mt_idle.hkx.

[list]
[*]\"Female BBB plus Male\", if you want BBB (requires [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics[/url])
[*]\"Female non-BBB plus Male\", if you DON\'T want BBB (no other requirements)
[/list]

[color=yellow]Uninstall[/color]

Simply delete the mt_idle.hkx from the following directories:
[list]
[*]Data/Meshes/actors/character/animations/female
[*]Data/Meshes/actors/character/animations/female
[/list]

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]History[/color][/size]

2012/01/26 V0.1 . . Initial Relase (BETA)

___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/size]

TheFigment [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1797]hkxcmd[/url]
CherryHotaling [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics[/url]
Without their pioneer work I would not be able to make any animation yet. Any maybe for long.
 
___________________________________________________________________________________
[size=3][color=yellow]Licensing/Legal[/color][/size]

You are NOT ALLOWED to upload contents of this mod TO ANY OTHER SITE.

On SKYRIMNEXUS.com you can do whatever you want with this mod.
All I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
I also like to be informed which mods are including my work.
author: fore
